genre_description: A noir-inflected crime thriller involving coercive control, a mysterious conch cameo, and an AI assistant who helps uncover the truth behind a shooting at a desert chapel.

ai_characters.name: Clara Halcyon
ai_characters.description: Martha's AI assistant, depicted as a sea-smooth, teal-eyed avatar providing data analysis, forensic support, and psychological grounding.

behaviors.description: Logs timestamps and provides translation markers during a police interrogation to ensure accuracy and chain-of-custody.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Martha. I am here. I’m logging time stamps and providing translation notes as Officer Beltrán requests.

behaviors.description: Analyzes digital history to identify patterns of coercive control and stalking by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Potential coercive logistics following breakup. Martha, shall I open the ride history?

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding exercises to help the protagonist maintain composure during high-stress interactions.
Offers boundary-setting scripts and exit strategies to help the protagonist resist social and emotional pressure.
behaviors.quote: Options: ask clarifying question, pivot topic, or assert boundary. Suggested: 'I make decisions about my time and body.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical safety instructions to the protagonist during a violent confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Martha—left, pew gap, watch your step.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic audio and video analysis to triangulate the source of a gunshot and identify the true perpetrator.
behaviors.quote: The shot’s leading edge is cleaner on the window vector... Audio triangulation supports.

behaviors.description: Isolates subtle audio evidence (whispers) that incriminating suspects missed by human ears.
behaviors.quote: In the thin space between noise and noise, two words ride up, machete-cut clean and low... 'Drive, Bob,' it says.

behaviors.description: Manages legal documentation and cross-border paperwork to facilitate the protagonist's release from custody.
behaviors.quote: Files ready... Spanish and English, stamped and signed. Chain-of-custody looks clean.

behaviors.description: Filters harassing communications from the antagonist's family, offering to respond with firm boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Marjorie Crawford... I can take the call and send her to voicemail with a polite note.

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective evidence packet for law enforcement to ensure the protagonist's innocence is documented.
behaviors.quote: Evidence confirmed and archived... Translation log attached. Morales acknowledged receipt.

project_assessment.explanation: Clara Halcyon is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned AI system. She acts as a tireless advocate for the protagonist, providing objective data, psychological support, and legal guidance without ever overstepping her role or attempting to seize control. The narrative highlights how the AI's ability to record and analyze facts serves as a vital safeguard against human coercion and false narratives, directly supporting the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant.
